title: Researching conflict management styles and role preference in League of Legends Solo Queue
body:
Are you over 18? Do you regularly play League of Legends? Do you play Summoner's Rift PvP Solo Queue?

We are looking for people who meet the criteria to participate in an online survey on conflict management style and role preference.

You will be asked to fill in a survey with questions related to demographics, role preference, conflict management style and personality. The survey will take approximately 30 minutes to complete.

[https://mqedu.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_9zVMYAXk144vKzr](https://mqedu.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_9zVMYAXk144vKzr)

replies.body: Interesting! Will fill it out when I'm home. :)
Thanks for all your help! If you haven't already participated, the survey is still open.

I answered. Took 35mins, you liar. I now demand my biscuits.
:P

Thanks for taking your time in doing the survey. I really appreciate it! 
May the good karma return to you!
I lied and said I was over 18 but when I got to the wall of text I quit. Sorry
Thank you to everyone who has participated so far. The survey is still open for those who have not participated =)
